name: American Football Quiz: NFL Records | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following set a record in 2002 for most receptions in a season?
questions.explanation:
Marvin Harrison.

	Marvin Harrison had 143 receptions in 2002 for the Indianapolis Colts.

questions.text: Which of the following set a record in 1984 for most passing yards in a season?
questions.explanation:
Dan Marino.

	Dan Marino had 5084 passing yards in 1984 for the Miami Dolphins.

questions.text: In 2003, which of the following set a record for most rushing yards in a game?
questions.explanation:
Jamal Lewis.

	Jamal Lewis had 295 rushing yards against the Cleveland Browns in the 2003 for the Baltimore Ravens.

questions.text: Which of the following set a record for most wins as a coach in NFL history?
questions.explanation:
Don Shula.

	Remember, he coached that Miami Dolphin team that went 17-0.

questions.text: Which of the following four has more MVP awards?
questions.explanation:
Brett Favre.

	Brett Favre won three MVP awards for the Packers.
